Description: Job DescriptionAre you a seasoned real estate professional looking for your next big opportunity? Black & Grey HR is recruiting experienced Senior Real Estate Brokers to sell Off-Plan Properties through a leading real estate firm in Dubai. If you're ready to make a significant impact, please apply now!- Build and maintain client relationships to offer tailored property solutions.- Negotiate and close complex real estate deals.- Implement data-backed advertising and marketing strategies.- Provide in-depth information on legal guidelines, property rates, and market trends.- Conduct property viewings that meet the high expectations of discerning buyers.- Utilize market analytics for informed decision-making.- Process transactions with precision and accountability.- Represent the client's brand with utmost professionalism.- Expand and manage your high-value professional network.Requirements- Minimum of 5 years of experience in real estate, with a focus on off-plan properties.- Bachelorâ€™s degree or higher.  - Proficiency in English communication.- A proven portfolio of successful real estate transactions.- Comprehensive understanding of real estate laws and regulations.- Advanced communication, negotiation, and time management skills.Benefits - Competitive salary plus commission structure- A comprehensive benefits package tailored to your experience level.Job Details
